scenario: In 2025, Heidi has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) of $150,291.06. Heidi makes a charitable contribution of $84,870.72 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(d)(1), the deduction is limited to 50% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2025.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 50% of AGI ($75,145.53). Allowable: $75,145.53.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
